title: Weekly Digest (19 July, 2020 - 26 July, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 22 issues were created.
Of these, 7 issues have been closed and 15 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10994 [Creating "myself" 1-1 chat on a synchronized device (was recovered with seed phrase) after sending Address request from a device with keycard account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10994), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10993 [Redundant step in changing PIN flow after entering invalid passcode 3 times (user is logged in)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10993), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10991 [Design of several screens in frozen card flow when user is logged in doesn't correspond to the original design](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10991), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10990 [Add option to show default chat on onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10990), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10988 [Add entry point to start new chat from search results](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10988), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10987 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10987), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #10986 ["Select account" bottom sheet view is changed (after "Accept and share" action in  commands in 1-1 chat)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10986), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10985 [The message "2 attempts left" after entering wrong 6-digit passcode on the "changing PIN" flow (Profile -> Keycard settings) isn't shown every time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10985), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10980 [Header text and button "Cancel" are overlapped with status bar on "Scan QR code" view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10980), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10978 [Endless loading public chat name 0x](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10978), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10977 [Research of log behavior in Nightly and Release](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10977), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10976 [Crash java.lang.NullPointerException on login on keycard multiaccount with enabled fingerprint](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10976), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10975 [Missing translation on Keycard login page](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10975), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10974 [ENS resolving for IPNS names.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10974), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:green_heart: #10973 [Add path scanning to 'Access existing keys' and upon request](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10973), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10992 [Shrink left side in toolbar to not overflow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10992), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10989 [sign_in keycard e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10989), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10984 [[TESTS] fix 22.07.20 nightly failures](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10984), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10983 [WIP: Tests/e2e nightly fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10983), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10982 [[keycard framework] Can't relogin after creating account with keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10982), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10981 [Fix parens on intro screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10981), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10979 [No margin between "Re-encrypt your keys" button and bottom panel during recovery from seed phrase flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10979), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10977 [Research of log behavior in Nightly and Release](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10977), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10987 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10987), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
It received 3 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 18 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 8 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10987 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10987), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:yellow_heart: #10955 [[#10195] Delete multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10955), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #10936 [Nim-Status: iOS support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10936), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #10935 [[WIP] ios pn](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10935), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10912 [WIP: Add reactions picker UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10912), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10910 [Chat api](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10910), by [bgits](https://github.com/bgits)
:yellow_heart: #10810 [audio messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10810), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #10620 [Add referral share link ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10620), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 10 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10992 [Shrink left side in toolbar to not overflow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10992), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10989 [sign_in keycard e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10989), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #10984 [[TESTS] fix 22.07.20 nightly failures](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10984), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #10981 [Fix parens on intro screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10981), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10971 [Add e2e test for PN](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10971), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #10970 [Fix images issues](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10970), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10967 [Fix backup seed pharse ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10967), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10966 [Allow nested touchable in list item](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10966), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10952 [fix/tutorial-link](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10952), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:purple_heart: #10873 [New UI for chat input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10873), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 11 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Shrink left button in toolbar to not overflow  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5b5096a6d7039a050cb631630eeb5286afb631b6) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix parens on intro screens  Fixes #10979  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/729a35d8302f22bd3011bf146cf7739ab1de945e) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [sign_in keycard e2e fix  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/fb9ab82d7b98c70558594c4747513b391e00750e) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update views.cljs  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f8af5a51be14b447b484a10fb25b44b11ced6fc6) by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix 22.07.20 nightly failures  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f057d527b5ca87ba05105567ab00168e3e718394) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Allow nested touchable in list item  Fixes #10924  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3b17a46bf8e51ba6ca039715fe1d5d3add109a3b) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add e2e test for PN  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/afb4e9fdb9c1f523212d79e4a12858f7f2902205) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add interactive dismiss and new input UI  New input UI  Inverse panel height calculation  Remove old chat input  Better animations  fix for pasting text  Add buttons accessibility  Fix dark mode  Update react navigation to fix the keyboard issues  Force close bottom sheet  Unmount android bottom sheet when not visible  Reset bottom sheet height android  more fixes  more fixes  Add hidden audio icon  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e8fca7ce6877272ae51832939d032f04789bde22) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Disabled next in password screen  Fixes #10965  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6fcb426a712996f7b314b2f27100dedd17b043d4) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix UI issues in backup seed phrase  Fixes #10964](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4f135292a530287a6a808f5b58b00e8baecd1adc) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update image resizer  Do not resize images in camera roll  request permission on camera roll  fix images e2e  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0f07f3eecb3b91574b51403abee0f1c16e96e1a4) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

 - - - 
# CONTRIBUTORS
Last week there were 4 contributors.
:bust_in_silhouette: [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:bust_in_silhouette: [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:bust_in_silhouette: [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)

# STARGAZERS
Last week there was 1 stargazer.
:star: [Kamalnrf](https://github.com/Kamalnrf)
You are the star! :star2:

 - - - 
# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
